input_email_body:
Subject: Problem with Campaign Efficiency Noted

Respected Customer Service Team, I am contacting you to address a sudden drop in my campaign efficiency. It appears to be due to a misconfiguration in targeting, though I am uncertain. I've attempted to rectify this situation by modifying the ad text and the budget allocation, but the problem remains unresolved. I would be grateful if you could investigate and offer a solution promptly You can reach me at omar.hassan@secure.net.. Please inform me if extra details are required for your assessment. I appreciate your prompt attention to this matter. Best regards, [Your Name] My name is Omar Hassan.
